I think you might really enjoy "The Weight of Water"! The historical setting and the parallel storyline between the protagonist and a witness from 1873 are both fascinating and thought-provoking. Plus, the strong female lead and gripping mystery will keep you engaged until the end.

If you're in the mood for something a bit more action-packed, I'd recommend "The Mask of Zorro"! The swashbuckling adventure, memorable characters (hello, Antonio Banderas!), and witty dialogue make it a thrilling ride.

This film is set in a similar era to The Weight of Water, with a focus on the intrigue and politics of the royal court. With an all-star cast, including Natalie Portman and Scarlett Johansson, you're sure to be drawn into the world of Henry VIII's court!
